name: Avraham Fried
description:
'''Avraham Shabsi Hakohen Friedman''' ({{langx|he| אברהם שבתי הכהן פרידמן}}; born March 22, 1959) better known by his [[stage name]], '''Avraham Fried''', is an [[Orthodox Judaism|Orthodox Jewish]] American singer.
